sections.title: Introduction
sections.content:

This article or section is being considered for removal.

Lexmark is a printer- and scanner-manufacturer. See:

- CUPS/Printer-specific problems#Lexmark for issues about Lexmark printers with CUPS;
- SANE/Scanner-specific problems#Lexmark for issues about Lexmark scanners with SANE.
